 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Kirk Cousins?
 Kirk Cousins is 37 years old.
 When was Kirk Cousins born?
 Kirk Cousins was born on August 19, 1988.
 Where was Kirk Cousins born?
 Kirk Cousins was born in Barrington, IL.
 How tall is Kirk Cousins?
 Kirk Cousins is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.
 How much does Kirk Cousins weigh?
 Kirk Cousins weighs 205 lbs (92 kg).
 How many games does Kirk Cousins play?
 Kirk Cousins played 164 games over his career.
 How many passing yards does Kirk Cousins have?
 Kirk Cousins had 42,979 passing yards over his career.
 How many touchdowns does Kirk Cousins have?
 Kirk Cousins had 288 touchdowns over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Kirk Cousins won?
 Kirk Cousins has never won a Super Bowl.
 What is Kirk Cousins' Instagram account?
 Kirk Cousins is on Instagram at kirkcousins.
 What are Kirk Cousins' nicknames?
 Captain Kirk, Kirktober, Kirko Chainz are nicknames for Kirk Cousins.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Larry Fitzgerald?
 Larry Fitzgerald is 42 years old.
 When was Larry Fitzgerald born?
 Larry Fitzgerald was born on August 31, 1983.
 Where was Larry Fitzgerald born?
 Larry Fitzgerald was born in Minneapolis, MN.
 How tall is Larry Fitzgerald?
 Larry Fitzgerald is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.
 How much did Larry Fitzgerald weigh when playing?
 Larry Fitzgerald weighed 218 lbs (98 kg) when playing.
 Is Larry Fitzgerald in the Hall of Fame?
 Larry Fitzgerald has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Larry Fitzgerald play?
 Larry Fitzgerald played 263 games over his career.
 How many receptions did Larry Fitzgerald have?
 Larry Fitzgerald had 1,432 receptions over his career.
 How many receiving yards did Larry Fitzgerald have?
 Larry Fitzgerald had 17,492 receiving yards over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Larry Fitzgerald won?
 Larry Fitzgerald has never won a Super Bowl.
 When did Larry Fitzgerald retire?
 Larry Fitzgerald last played in 2020.
 What is Larry Fitzgerald's Instagram account?
 Larry Fitzgerald is on Instagram at larryfitzgerald.
 What are Larry Fitzgerald's nicknames?
 Larry Legend is a nickname for Larry Fitzgerald.
